servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: DTC P0625: Generator Field Terminal Circuit Low

entry.ptxt: Duty signal of generator field coil is higher than 99.9% (low voltage) for 10 sec. even if duty control signal of generator control is maximum (100%).
(1 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: DTC P0626: Generator Field Terminal Circuit High

entry.ptxt: Duty control signal of generator field coil is lower than 1% (high voltage) for 10 sec. even if duty control signal of generator control is minimum (0%).
(1 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Check to make sure that the following conditions are met.
Run engine at idle speed for 5 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:J24B .

testgroup.title: Generator field coil monitor signal circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch and connectors from generator and ECM.
Check for proper terminal connection to generator connector and ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, check that generator field coil monitor signal circuit (B1) is as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of generator field coil monitor signal circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance between generator field coil monitor signal circuit and vehicle body ground is infinity.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between generator field coil monitor signal circuit terminal and each terminal at generator connector.
Circuit voltage of generator field coil monitor signal circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch in ON position.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P0625 or P0626 still detected?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
